titleStmt.title: Christian humiliation, or, A treatise of fasting declaring the nature, kindes, ends, vses, and properties of a religious fast: together with a briefe discourse concerning the fast of Lent. By Henry Mason, pastor of Saint Andrews-Vndershaft London.
titleStmt.author: Mason, Henry, 1573?-1647.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G[eorge] P[urslowe] for Iohn Clarke, and are to be sold at his shop vnder S. Peters Church in Corne-hill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
